channel.title: Develop Services on Apache Dubbo
channel.description: Recent content in Develop Services on Apache Dubbo

item.title: Apply Template
item.description: 1. Preparations dubbo-go cli tools and dependent tools have been installed 2. Use dubbogo-cli to create a project template Run dubbogo-cli newApp . $ mkdir cli-create-server $ cd cli-create-server $ dubbogo-cli newApp . $ tree . . ├── Makefile ├── api │ └── api.proto ├──build │ └── Dockerfile ├── chart │ ├── app │ │ ├── Chart.yaml │ │ ├── templates │ │ │ ├── _helpers.tpl │ │ │ ├── deployment.
